clue.en: Continuance or a period of time spent in a place; abode for an indefinite time; sojourn.
clue.zh: 在一个地方持续或度过一段时间；无限期居住；寄居。

clue.en: An unburnt brick dried in the sun.
clue.zh: 未烧完的砖在阳光下晒干。

clue.en: A unit of electrical power, in an AC circuit, equal to the power dissipated when 1 volt produces a current of 1 ampere.
clue.zh: 交流电路中的电功率单位，等于 1 伏特产生 1 安培电流时消耗的功率。

clue.en: A body of standing water, such as a lake or a pond. More specifically, it can refer to a lake that is broad in relation to its depth. Also included in place names such as Winder__.
clue.zh: 静止的水体，例如湖泊或池塘。更具体地说，它可以指相对深度而言较宽的湖泊。也包含在温德米尔等地名中。

clue.en: To exchange or give (something) in an exchange (for something else).
clue.zh: 交换或给予（某物）以交换（换取其他东西）。

clue.en: A body of standing water, such as a lake or a pond. More specifically, it can refer to a lake that is broad in relation to its depth. Also included in place names such as Winder__.
clue.zh: 静止的水体，例如湖泊或池塘。更具体地说，它可以指相对深度而言较宽的湖泊。也包含在温德米尔等地名中。

clue.en: A solid, more or less rigid object of metal or wood with a uniform cross-section smaller than its length.
clue.zh: 固体，或多或少刚性的金属或木材物体，具有小于其长度的均匀横截面。
